title: Space Elevators
alt: If you think space elevators are good, but just too boring and practical, check out the 'space fountain'.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan sit beside a moonlit lake.]
Cueball: Arthur C. Clarke said space elevators will be built 50 years after everybody stops laughing.[Closeup of Cueball.]
Cueball: So all we have to do is get Mind of Mencia on every channel and wait.
Megan (offscreen): Oh, hush.
